remarks: Alternate definition for the commutes relation.  ( ~ cmbr4i analog.) (Contributed by NM, 10-Nov-2011.)  (New usage is discouraged.)
statement:
cmtbr4.b $e |- B = ( Base ` K ) $.
cmtbr4.l $e |- .<_ = ( le ` K ) $.
cmtbr4.j $e |- .\/ = ( join ` K ) $.
cmtbr4.m $e |- ./\ = ( meet ` K ) $.
cmtbr4.o $e |- ._|_ = ( oc ` K ) $.
cmtbr4.c $e |- C = ( cm ` K ) $.
cmtbr4N $p |- ( ( K e. OML /\ X e. B /\ Y e. B ) -> ( X C Y <-> ( X ./\ ( ( ._|_ ` X ) .\/ Y ) ) .<_ Y ) ) $.
